_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Improper attendance to things that are g: Improper attendance to things that are grounds for sensual greed
Improper attendance to things that are grounds for ill will
Improper attendance to things that are grounds for dullness and drowsiness
Dullness and drowsiness increase and grow
Improper attendance to things that are grounds for restlessness and remorse
Restlessness and remorse increase and grow
Improper attendance to things that are grounds for doubt
Proper attendance to things that are gro: Proper attendance to things that are grounds for the awakening factor of mindfulness
The awakening factor of mindfulness arises
The awakening factor of mindfulness is fully developed
Proper attendance to things that are grounds for the awakening factor of equanimity
The awakening factor of equanimity arises
The awakening factor of equanimity is fully developed
